price: 10. Nous redoutons seulement, de la part de notre Seigneur, la venue d’un jour sombre et terrible.
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
